DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study MM-141 Plus Nab-paclitaxel Gemcitabine Front-line Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled Phase 2 study MM-141 plus nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine placebo plus nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine front-line metastatic pancreatic cancer . All patient initially screen free IGF-1 status . Eligible patient high free IGF-1 randomize receive MM-141 plus nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine placebo plus nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine patient . Patients low free IGF-1 patient high free IGF-1 otherwise eligible follow observational group .
